text: Cameron Riley Monaghan (born August 16, 1993) is an American actor and model. Monaghan is best known for his role as Ian Gallagher on the Showtime comedy- drama series Shameless. He has also appeared as Jeremiah Valeska also known as the Joker on the Fox crime series Gotham. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American child actors Category:American video game actors Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Florida Category:People from Boca Raton, Florida
title: Cameron Monaghan
